overview: Since 2016, Pope Fracis allows women to take part in the washing of the feet ceremony. The girls of St. Peter Church are preparing something special for the ritual. Camila just hopes to find Giovana.

title: Calypso
overview: Calypso and Ulisses live in exile in a collapsing world.

title: Sofá
overview: Joana D'Arc, a former public school teacher in Rio de Janeiro, tries to recover her home, lost to the City Hall. The trajectory is shared by the pirate fisherman Pharaó, from Guanabara Bay.

title: Os Sonâmbulos
overview: A tale of love and death in a world where the state of exception has become the rule and the last days of humanity never end.

title: Prometo Falhar - O Filme
overview: Documentary based on a book by Pedro Chagas Freitas

title: Sheila
overview: A film about the egocentric and superficial youth and the evermore consumerist society.

title: Unusual
overview: Marco is a 16-year-old who plays tennis daily as a way of sheltering his helplessness towards his father's depression.

title: Let the Storm
overview: Singer that so speaks to the moon / my story is the same as yours / my love also ran away.

title: Anteu
overview: Anteu is born in a village where he’s the only child around. His mother ends up dying after a while and the father soon follows suit. One by one the people from the village start to disappear and Anteu, now a 17 years old boy carries on with his solitary life. One night, a dream awakes him: who would bury him?

title: Pas de Confettis
overview: Vanessa is a teenager like many others, who lives with her mother in the periphery of a big city and misses school to player with her friends. Things change when she gets pregnant.

original_title: A Retirada para um Coração Bruto
title: A Retirada para um Coração Bruto
overview: Ozório is a man who lives alone in an isolated place. He spends his days listening to rock on the radio, while mourning for the loss of his wife. This is until a movement in the sky breaks his loneliness.

title: My Neighbor Flora
overview: Alice's life changes when Laura, the daughter of her neighbor on the wall, knocks on her door to ask if she knows anything about her mother. No one has seen her for days, neither Alice nor Laura, nor the lonely residents of the building.
tagline: What do I do now?

original_title: A Coisa Mais Simples do Mundo
title: The Simplest Thing in the World
overview: The short film deals with the character of Henry Dorn, who tries to write a script for a commercial movie after a major failure, the character will have to deal with his demons and his constant indecision in trying to find an approach that is pleasing to his eyes. Based on the tale "The Simplest Thing in the World" by Ayn Rand (available in The Romantic Manifesto)
tagline: A Short Film by Caio Amaral Based on the Story by Ayn Rand.

original_title: De Tanto Olhar o Céu Gastei Meus Olhos
title: Buried Sky
overview: Luana and Wagner's father sends a letter after years of neglect. Wagner believes his father may have changed. Not Luana.

title: Para Eric
overview: A short film based on true events, it tells the story of Arthur's search for his husband Eric, who disappeared after losing his memory in a car accident.

title: Sleeping Hammock
overview: Rede de Dormir starring Gilda Nomacce, Vitor Dutra, and Cida Augusto. A tale about the hammock and its forgotten use as a shroud.

title: #NUDES
overview: Leo and Maysa are a couple going through problems on their relationship. They start going out with Adélia and Heitor, a couple they just met, and this union changes their lives and dynamics as partners completely.

title: Não tão Longe
overview: A couple wanders. They talk. They are silent. They wander more.

title: Menarche
overview: Luísa is forbidden to go out on the street by her mother after being harassed. At home, imagination is the limit.

title: Republic
overview: One night, a Brazilian woman wakes up in a country exhausted from violent acts. Republic is a short film realized at home, in the beginning of 2020s quarantine, in the center of São Paulo, República neighborhood.

title: Yellow Country
overview: In a remote and inhospitable place with its own rules, we follow the journey of a group of women forced into slavery.

title: Belonging
overview: The story takes place in 1948, in post WWII Europe. Amelia, a young girl, who struggles to communicate with her mother after the death of her father, is sent to the Portuguese provincial town of Elvas for a holiday with her uncles. There she meets Thomas, an Austrian refugee boy, who is being fostered by her Aunt and Uncle while they find his parents from whom he was separated during the war. After a rocky start, these children teach each other the true meaning of friendship and communication. This tale is based on a true story of the director’s grandmother who met a young refugee.

title: Kuru
overview: Three girlfriends, a summer night and a green eyed man. A true urban story.

title: E Amanhã...
overview: Miguel, a young writer studying cinema, releases his first best-seller at the age of 21. Maria, Psychology student, raised in a wealthy family. She is struggling for fame; Miguel is a humble human being. Their love story is compromised by their different goals in life. Miguel gives up on everything, and disappears for three years looking for the real meaning of life.

title: Triple A
overview: A mockumentary with an actual documentary inside, tells the unusual story of Artist António André's (Triple A). With Arcos de Valdevez, a portuguese northern village, as background, it questions the relevance of art in our time.

title: Destiny Deluxe
overview: Through a city that carries the weight of broken expectations and tough absencies, we follow the day of three young adults. César who got into a photoshoot by accident, Chloé who hopes to find a place to do her own work, and Helena who is back in her town for some days, only to find the living shadow of a loss.

title: The Portrait
overview: Abel Salazar, a scientist and an artist persecuted by the Fascist regime in the 40ies, is trying to finish a portrait, obsessed by the face of a woman. Ana, a young researcher in the present days, is dreaming about him. Or is it the other way round?

title: Vidas a Crédito
overview: Sofia is a big spender so she frequently abuses of the credit card. When her husband is fired, she is forced to change her life.

title: Directo
overview: A couple watches a bank robbery live on TV.

title: Breastfeeding Bats
overview: A film that addresses family influence in the construction of social concepts

original_title: Em Cada lar Perfeito um Coração Desfeito
title: In Every Dream Home a Heartache
overview: An essay about disaffection in 7 segments inspired by Stendhal's seven stages of love, "De L'Amour" (1822). Most people are afraid of love because they are afraid of their deepest joy, delight and inner freedom.

title: I Love You, Bressan
overview: After breaking up with his boyfriend, Bressan will try to tell the story of his relationship in a not so ordinary love tale.

title: Calcamar
overview: Conceição escapes from the Nursing Home with the help of her grandaughter Lia. The two of them go on a trip to the coast of Algarve in order to watch a bird called Calcamar.

title: O Dia da Exaltação
overview: Portuguese short-film.

title: Under the Skin
overview: Man and Woman are reunited after a long time. Sorrow and desire cannot break the silence. But that's okay: when words don't come, it's the body that speaks.

title: Epistolar
overview: Short coming-of-age set in the 1970s, where Sicília moves to São Paulo and meets Natália, with whom she gets really close to and together both discover more about life and love.
tagline: The beginning of love in the 1970s

title: The Last Romantics of the World
overview: 2050. The world as we know is about to be destroyed by a pink cloud. Away from the cities and lost on inhabited roads, Pedro and Miguel search for eternity.

title: Sometimes we're the same height
overview: Alagoas countryside. Laura misses a party to travel with her father. There, in the house where they grew up, she is left alone by him, who only returns to the house for dinner.

title: Rebento
overview: What seemed to be a young couple's trivial uneasiness is redefined as a result of important news: Jéssica is pregnant and reveals it to Zói. While she seeks warmth and dialogue, he turns to a reflective state of mind further enhanced by the uncertainties of job hunting. Nonetheless, the women around him become decisive in the task of making him see the root cause of the problem: the cycle of paternal absence that he himself went through in the past but now is in a position to change.
tagline: Zói, upon learning of his girlfriend's pregnancy, unleashes suspended feelings.

title: Constança
overview: Portugal, 1340. Ines de Castro and D.Pedro lived the most popular love story ever to be known in this land yet little do we know about its origins and the silent tragedy carried by Constanca.

title: O Jogo
overview: Félix, a Down syndrome child who is passionate about soccer gets the opportunity to take part in the main soccer team in a match against the rival school.

title: Farewell
overview: Three friends are at the beach. It is the last day of summer the moon is rising. One of them decides to hold his breath until the moon appears completely in the horizon.

title: The Face of the Woman in Debt
overview: The faces of ten women, actual mothers of [pH2]: estado de teatro’s members, expand the face of Helena Failure and enact the misfortunes that tackled her life.

title: Portraits of Your Face
overview: Your eyes. Big, round and black. Later on they were still stuck on me. Like buttons.

title: Tereza
overview: Chico ventures himself into changing his life, regardless of the risks. In order to reach this objective he must rely not only on his courage but, above all, on Tereza.

title: Quantic Love
overview: A mysterious shadow unveiling a female figure walking naked towards us in the desert. In another sequence, the same woman speaks on the phone, talking about the end of the world. In a third moment, a couple prepares breakfast in their apartment, with the same woman from the previous sequences embracing a baby. What will these three narrative moments have in common? What is the relationship between them? Everything and nothing. Is the answer in the woman’s emotional words on the phone? Or in her helpless expression when walking naked? Or in the happiness she seems to find in the domestic routine? Perhaps the charm is really not in trying to decipher, but in getting lost in this visual and impressionistic poem, this shake that slowly expands in our senses. Max Planck, one of the founders of the ancient quantum physics theory, said that energy has a discontinuous structure and can only exist under the form of fragments. These are the fragments that hide here an ethereal promise.

original_title: A Última Frente Fria Antes do Verão
title: The Last Cold Front Before the Summer
overview: A grieving young man is forced to move on with his life after his long-term girlfriend is brutally killed because of him in Rio de Janeiro.

title: Rua 57, Nº 60, Centro
overview: On 13 September 1987, Goiânia was the setting of the most serious radiological accident in history, when collectors of recycled material found in a hospital in ruins a device containing a capsule of Caesium-137.

title: Olga Drummond
overview: A homage to all Portuguese actors. The news that Olga Drummond, the greatest Portuguese actress of all-time, is arriving to a nursing home for performers provokes agitation between residents and workers.

title: Cinerama
overview: Humberto hanged himself. Catarina, Paulo and Victor want the company where Humberto used to work for to take responsibility in his death, leading them to kidnappe the company’s director in an act of despair. Who is Humberto? What company is that? In which paths will he take us, after his death?  Cinerama is an edgy, enigmatic, but not distant film that brings up genres of cinema as well as other forms of art like dance, theatre and poetry. The film reflects ways of being in life.

title: Noite na Taverna
overview: Álvares de Azevedo was a 19th century Brazilian romantic writer. He died prematurely (died at the age of 21), but left a significant work for Brazilian literature. Among her, the novel “Noite na Taverna”. The film, loosely inspired by the book, tells a day in the life of its author in parallel with that which is one of its darkest and most complex characters, Johann. Inserted in the same universe (a hypothetical São Paulo of 1850), Álvares lives a normal day of his academic life while Johann is involved in a death duel that triggers in several other consequences such as murder and rape.

title: Haiku from a Dead Poet
overview: A poetry film made entirely with a cell phone exploring the regret and longing of a Brazilian immigrant in London.

original_title: Onde O Céu Acerta Seus Ponteiros
title: Where the Sky Sets the Clock
overview: After his mother’s passing, Tomas’ life turned black and white. Days change when he meets Gabriel, a photographer with a red jacket who helps him see other colors.

title: The Hours Of Light
overview: Maria da Luz is almost blind. She's been waiting for cataract surgery for 3 years. António, an old fisherman, takes care of her, hiding the secret of an old love. Miguel, a mysterious boy, wanders through the city, watching daily for Maria's house. Luís, the mayor, seeks to solve the problem of hundreds of people with cataracts in the Municipality. Ana, Maria's daughter visits her mother. Despite their misfortune, they seek to redeem themselves under the eyes of António and Miguel. Maria da Luz is not alone.

title: How She Looks
overview: The film follows a few days in the life of a young actress who has lost her sight, but who tries to be independent, also addressing the tension and trust between the protagonist and a student hired to help her.

title: The Eyes of the Lighthouse
overview: In a rocky island exposed to the elements, a lighthouse keeper lives alone with his daughter. From the top of his tower, the father keeps vigil to the horizon line and for the safety of the passing sails. With no other company, the girl develops a unique complicity with the sea, which brings her toys in the shape of debris on the shore. Following the rhythm of the waves, these objects will unveil previous events, memories that the tide cannot erase…

title: Alice by Night
overview: Even before we know ourselves, when we are little the only thing we want is to be loved. "Alice By Night" is an observational fiction. It shows us the common state we are when in love and the determination when being after someone. An analysis on the old illusion that the prince charming will come and fill the emotional weaknesses we have in life.

title: Darwin's Cave
overview: The transmission of knowledge between mothers and daughters

title: First Light
overview: The south wind stirred the dawn. I got up before them to film them.
tagline: Film commissioned as a Carte Blanche of the Montreal Festival Du Nouveau Cinéma

title: Young Polacas
overview: The story of the famous "Polacas", Jewish women deceived into prostitution in Rio de Janeiro in the early 1900's. Ricardo interviews Mrs. Mira, who struggles to bring back memories from her mother's past as a Polaca.

title: Redemunho
overview: Mother and son are the last survivors of an tradicional family in Brazil northeast.

title: Traces Two
overview: Two friends move to Rio de Janeiro and begin to perceive each other better through daily and close coexistence, which shows signs of new possibilities for affection and rapprochement.

title: New Camera
overview: Rafa is testing his new camera, Rui and Ana are picking him up. The camera keeps filming.

title: We Shall Return
overview: Angola's complex history seen through the eyes of a fake taxidermy sable antelope. She takes us on a journey that links colonial ideas from the past with contemporary reality. This short contemplation on the conservation of memory is a brilliant mix between static painted, staged histories, and a physical parade through the streets.

title: Doblez
overview: Guilherme is tormented by the possibility of his fiancée being cheating on him. Desperate to end this mystery, he plans out a terrible way to finding the truth.
tagline: ADMIT!

title: Aurora
overview: A very old lady waits for her son to arrive so that she can get out of sight.

title: Chime on Trill
overview: Arthur and Alexandre are childhood friends. While one feels pressured to give the first kiss, the other wants to become a great rapper and record his first clip. By helping each other, they start new discoveries.

title: Perifericu
overview: Luz and Denise grow up in the midst of the adversities of being LGBT in the extreme south of the city of São Paulo. Between Vogue and poetry, from church to city access. The dreams and uncertainties of youth flood their existences.

title: Serenity
overview: The streets are deserted, they run for peace, but peace is the enemy.

title: Mansão do Amor
overview: Seeks new artists for a job interview.

title: EGUM
overview: after years abroad due to his brother's murder, a renowned journalist returns to his family's home to take care of his mother, who suffers from an unknown illness. late at night, he is visited by two strangers. as new events unfold leading him to suspect that something ominous and deeply disturbing has struck his mother, a new tragedy rises.
tagline: OUR ANCESTORS DON'T REST IN PEACE. AN AFRO-SURREAL HORROR FILM.

title: The Uninhabitable Ones
overview: A dance group rehearses for their latest performance Inabitáveis about black homosexuality. While the choreographer conducts research and gives guided tours, he meets Pedro, a young trans girl looking for her own means of expression. She desperately wants to be taught by him.

title: Bread and People
overview: Dispossessed in an essay about the daily bread. In a country like Brasil, of such abyssal social inequality as there is here, it's urgent for me in cinema to talk about the class to which I belong, the class-who-lives-on-labor. And, alongside that, about the labor relations, the survival, the unemployment, the increasingly impoverished life, the small popular uprisings and the confrontations with the non natural order of things. In "Bread and People", we deal with ruins. And in the struggle of the old against the new, we face mainly the ruin of an idea of progress, and the debris of a critical anti capitalist art today. We've deepened our investigation of an epic, historical and dialectical cinema, using the materials of inspiration themselves.

title: Natureza Morta
overview: The narrative takes place in 1888 and tells the story of Lenita, a young woman, raised by her father, with an educated background, who disregards the existence of a man at his intellectual height. The film exposes the character's internal conflicts and the conventions of the time.

title: Rain Hums a Lullaby to Pain
overview: In the year 74 BC, Titus Lucretius Carus, a young man with bold ideas, tries to convince his friend Memio that moving to the city of Rome to study is a total waste of time. Years later, Lucretius returns from the capital. Trying to find a balance between his explanations of the natural world and his emotional experience of it, Lucretius lives a deep and troubled passion with his foreign wife Isa.

title: Joderismo
overview: On the first year of a far right government in Brazil, Joder decides to investigate his health after moving to Brasilia for work.

title: Em Reforma
overview: Bianca, a public school teacher, decides to renovate her house after receiving the news that her daughter is coming home.

title: The Secret According to António Botto
overview: Antonio Botto and Fernando Pessoa, two renowned Portuguese poets, exchanged fictitious love letters. Botto wrote under his own name, and Pessoa signed as 'Manuel de Andrade'. But as time passed, these letters gained a new level of importance in both poets' lives.

original_title: O Sol Nasce Sempre do Mesmo Lado
title: O Sol Nasce Sempre do Mesmo Lado
overview: Three teenagers, a young couple and a middle-aged man meet on a night that will dramatically mark their lives.

title: Esperança
overview: After being separated from his unit during the battle for Montese in 1945, a young Brazilian soldier fights a battle within himself on whether or not he should continue on.

original_title: O Garoto do Fim do Mundo
title: O Garoto do Fim do Mundo
Um Desejo de Natal
overview: Several stories of love and hope, united by invisible threads. There are those who call these threads magic, some who call them destiny. What matters is that they will lead all of our characters to the same outcome, on the same day: Christmas Eve

title: Profjam #000000
overview: ProfJam wanted to show the contrast for his debut album and do it using the big screen

title: The Egg and The Chicken
overview: Writer Clarice Lispector investigates and develops the old question of what came first, the egg or the chicken.

title: Rompecabezas
overview: A time-displaced group of militants decides to kidnap an ex-torturer.

title: Música para Ninar Dinossauros
overview: There are three friends in their fifties who, unable to have conventional relations with women, always call girls to call them to keep them company.  They are the subjects who were born in the 60s, with all the explosions of rebellion and the search for freedom.

title: A Letter to A.H.
overview: A young screenwriter does not have more creativity to write movies. Everything changes when he meets Aline, an extroverted woman, that helps him to find inspiration for a story.
tagline: If you have a story, you need to tell it

title: Prata
overview: Gustavo loses his job for not believing in the revelation of the first image of a black hole, and now he doesn’t know what to do.

title: Hear the Cyclone
overview: Among grand mal seizures and geomagnetic storms in São Paulo, André looks for his mother and his lost affections.

title: Páginas Da Loucura
overview: The short "Paginas Da Loucura", is a psychological horror made by the students of the Academia Internacional de Cinema in São Paulo. The script freely inspired by the short story “A função da Leitura I” by Eduardo Galeano, and tells the story of a young adult Lucia and her elderly uncle Eustácio, that keeps his sick wife suspiciously locked in a room. Her life will change forever when she finds a mysterious old book of evil.

title: A Portion of Wrath
overview: The rising YouTube star (kind of actually) Theo, is called for a meeting with his ex-wife, Helena, at a (quite strange) bar. As they discuss their old and present affairs, the Barman try to tone them down. Their actions will lead to a difficult choice (at least for them) that neither of the two would ever imagine.

title: The Mother
overview: A street vendor who lives in the outskirts of São Paulo returns home at night and does not find her teenager son. After a nonstop search, she finds out the boy was killed by the police and his body is missing. This is the beginning of this woman’s vertiginous fight for the right to bury her son, a fight that will not only unveil the excessive violence of one of most lethal police forces of the world, but also how structural is racism in Brazilian society.

title: The Joy Of Things
overview: In a small Brazilian seaside town we follow the efforts of Paula, who is pregnant of her third child, to build a pool in her humble beach house, so the family can enjoy the rest of their vacation. Financial difficulties will interrupt the work and reveal certain aspects of a tense family routine, full of small frustrations.

title: Odyssey
overview: The love story between Eduardo and Ícaro, a gay couple who met right before Eduardo traveled abroad. A film that seeks to explore the debate between virtual relationships and the virtualization of romance.

original_title: O Amor É a Solução Para a Falta de Argumento
title: Love Is the Answer for the Lack of Argument
overview: It is not the landscape that changes. Every service station is a service station. What changes is being in movement.

title: Dry Flowers
overview: After a difficult divorce from his parents, Frederico decides to live with his mother in São Paulo City in order to study engineering, a childhood dream. However, Fred begins to see himself in a different way, his best friend starts dating the girl of your dreams and he comes face-to-face with his biggest problem, himself.

title: Alice & Só
overview: Alice, a young music lover, and her best friend Socrates, go on a road trip, accompanied by Tinho, a former rocker, to play at the world's largest cover band festival.

title: Donzela Guerreira
overview: Emilia is a writer, living in Lisbon in the year 1959. She is the “Damsel Warrior”, a fictional woman composed from the literary universes of Maria Judite de Carvalho and Irene Lisboa, writers of the city and the characters that inhabit it.

title: Eventide
overview: A man and a woman relive moments of their lives transfigured on the landscape of a beach. Past, present and future merge in the cadence of the waters, which come and go revolving memories and old silences. So the characters go through a sort of trail of desire, leading the edge of the abyss of themselves, where all days born and die, the horizon of all passes, all eventides.
tagline: A man and a woman relive moments of their lives transfigured on the landscape of a beach. Past, present and future merge in the cadence of the waters, which come and go revolving memories and old silences.

title: Raw
overview: A downtown square in a Brazilian city is the central stage for a series of close observations of one of the prostitutes working the streets. Apart from their mutual understanding, these women's lives seem doomed to pass by unnoticed. Filmed with cool reserve, Raw leaves the viewer with a sense of poignancy.

title: Silent Movie
overview: The “Cinema Mudo” project is the realization of a short film and at the same time helping and integrating residents of a community living in a high-risk area. All children (actors and actresses) who work in the movie are residents in the community Vila Torres, an at-risk area in Curitiba. They were chosen after a theater classes for children held in that community as part as the film project.  Most of the residents of this community live from the collection and recycling of garbage in the city of Curitiba.  The story shows three children (two boys and a girl), in the mid-thirties, setting up a movie frame projection room. They build a projector with an empty shoe box with two holes with the size of a film frame. Inside the box they put a burnt-out bulb without its filament and filled with water. This bulb is used as a lens. Children had to wait until the bulb burned out. Those electrical bulbs were rare in those days.

title: At Sea
overview: No Mar is a film about Cecília, the only teacher on a small fishing island. One fateful morning Cecília's daughter Maria asks her best friend Lúcia to cover for her as she goes to the beach to watch her father's boat come in. She never returns. Cecília struggles to deal with the guilt of her daughters death and attempts to embrace the impoverished Lúcia. Lúcia's own struggle with her friends death and eventual confession, forces Cecília to reconcile with her own grief and loss.

title: The Earth of No Return
overview: Somewhere in an unspecified time, Patrick Mendes presents an initiation ritual in a community at the ends of the earth.

title: Seas of the Banished
overview: A young woman, holding an important secret and refusing to bow to oppression, exposes the individual dynamics and relationships established in her family that has lived in isolation on a deserted beach for ten years.

title: Tonight
overview: Mariana died today. Or yesterday, maybe. While sitting at the Cafe, David spends his last night on Earth reflecting about himself, his time, and his human condition.

title: Príncipe
overview: While wandering around the city on his bike, as if trying to find a path for his life, a nameless protagonist thinks about the encounters and mis-encounters that perpetuate or change his routines, about the fears that trap him and the dreams and desires that set him free. Gradually, the vertices of a love triangle are revealed, leading him to confess his anxieties and to question his certainties.

title: Our Kingdom
overview: In a village where time and space run out, a child dwells in the death vortex.

title: Clareando
overview: Clara lives in a city too big for her taste. The days go monotonous and lifeless. When she begins to receive intriguing anonymous messages, the feeling that a change will soon happen becomes to rise. But at the same time, she is faced with a fundamental question: it would there be movement if it were not the impulse? This plot is developed across the film only by the sensory experience of the character.

title: Os Barcos
overview: I saw leaves that were moving. I thought: "It's a bird in its nest". I separated the leaves and looked; but there was no bird. The leaves continued to move. As I ran, faster and faster, I screamed. What moved the leaves? What moves my heart, my legs?

title: No Fixed Abode
overview: Between April and July 2020, filmmakers Davi Mello and Deborah Perrotta exchanged video letters. He lives in São Paulo. She lives in Turin.

title: Fear of time
overview: Pedro remembers great discoveries of youth that may no longer make sense. Between antique absolute truths and the time that passed, only one thing remained.
tagline: Past and present talk about the same thing in this movie.

title: SMS to Antigone
overview: At the age of twenty, Maria interweaves her time between her role as an actress at the local theatre company and her work as a cashier in a supermarket chain, with the aim of achieving the great dream of pursuing theatre studies abroad. The dichotomy between this wonderful dream world is abruptly cut daily by the reality of the work, populated by rules that are incomprehensible to her. Two events completely change Mary's journey, testing her ideal in life. Is the ability to realise a dream capable of overcoming all the obstacles encountered?

title: After Being Ashes
overview: Three women with completely different backgrounds have one thing in common: they loved and were connected to the same man. From the point of view of these women, through an intricate structure moving back and forth in time, Raul enters the story.

title: For Her
overview: Teobaldo is a divorced elderly person who lives with his caregiver, Magda. After receiving worrying news about his health, he orders a bunny costume on the internet. One day, in the middle of the night, he puts the costume on and, with Magda's help, puts on make-up and takes a picture to send to his ex-wife, as a way to apologize.
tagline: A sex costume is delivered at Teobaldo's house. In the middle of the night, he wakes up to dress it up and take a picture to send to his ex-wife.

title: Ten-Love
overview: After a robbery in the streets of Porto Alegre, Georgia and Bruno will have their lives intertwined by a tennis game orchestrated by the mysterious Jeweler.

title: RUA
overview: The dark side of the streets are portrayed in this story, that follows Mike's life in the space of a few days.

title: The Pleasure of Killing Bugs
overview: In the near future, the climate crisis reaches an irreversible point. A nun and a priest meet to talk about the disappearance of insects.
tagline: OUT OF PLACE

title: Comboio Pra Lua
overview: Pedro and Rebeca are friends and study in Portugal. Rebeca is Brazilian and Pedro is Portuguese. During coexistence, the two young people deal with feelings of non-belonging, loneliness and long-distance relationships.

title: Night Shift
overview: With no career expectations, a temperamental young woman gave in to a job as a maid in a hotel. Makes the beds, replaces the towels, replaces the soaps. One day she discovers a suitcase left behind by a whimsical French tourist, inside which she finds a lime green canary, a natural yogurt and a five hundred euro envelope.

title: O Homem das Gavetas
overview: A metaphorical approach of the seven deadly sins in the form of a man whose body is made of drawers. One day, one of his drawers opens and he begins a journey in search of a way to fill in his emptiness. An animated short film based on Salvador Dali’s ideas where the surrealist scenario meets the seven deadly sins.

title: Flush
overview: Tom, a conservative cisgender jock encounters Sarah, a non-binary person, in a university men’s toilets, but when he intends to leave, they have been accidentally locked in and are stuck together until morning.

title: I Will Never Shoot Again
overview: I Will Never Shoot Again
tagline: At Salvador, Bahia, a man that drinks meets again a woman that smokes.

title: Black Heart
overview: A couple looks to mend their relationship and build a new home in the Azores.

title: Baderna
overview: Baderna is a city in a countryside region of Brazil. Founded in 1871, it was built by black enslaved people and today it remains emancipated from the Brazilian state. With its mundane conflicts and its historical resistance, the city also maintains an intense relationship with nature. The movie narrates the day when Baderna receives 'Obaluaê', the 'Orixá' lord of the Earth, in a search for the cure of the 21st century.

title: Freezing Night in Castelo Branco
overview: Sofia and Marco, a young couple, is visiting Castelo Branco at night. They start a conversation with an homeless who-s playing guitar on the street. While the conversation takes place Sofia starts suspecting that he is the father she never knew...

title: Casa Na Comporta
overview: Casa Na Comporta is one of four films commissioned to different directors for the Portuguese architecture national exhibition at the Venice Biennale.

title: Second Half
overview: After theirs father's death, Carl and Ana decide to go to Germany to rescue his unknown story. There, not only will they discover familiar tracks, they will confront and recognize themselves, to move forward in their lives.

title: Don't Call Me That
overview: Daniela is about to have her long-awaited gender reassignment surgery, and she can't think about anything else. Roberto, her lover, tries to dissuade her from doing it, revealing an unsettling relationship that awakes past traumas.

title: Dead Model, Live Model
overview: Manuela, a trans woman, an artist, who, when attending a live model workshop, awakens to her own beauty and power, even though she has to face everyday difficulties, which require courage and determination.

title: Purple Dictatorship
overview: Yeda, the green-faced woman, sells homemade bread to support the house where she lives with her sick husband. Through the context of green-faced people, we know the reality of those who live on the fringes of a purple-faced society.

title: Wolfpack
overview: Women who run with each other.  Watch here: https://vimeo.com/369297512

title: Their Happiness
overview: Two girls run away from the police after the Women's March. In the midst of violence, they find a way to live their desire.

title: Síndrome de Stendhal
overview: A girl after being exposed to a work of art, enters a psychotic hallucination caused by Stendhal syndrome.

title: O Desvio
overview: Two erratic journeys whose only relation is all that happens at the same time and in a limited radius. It is a film that refuses to judge, trying to tell two stories while refusing to be subjected to analogies between them.

title: The River
overview: Joana and Samuel's relationship has a specif routine.

title: Looping
overview: The screams of despair in an amusement park foreshadow the scandal that love is. Looping, by Maick Hannder, uses photographs to enact the conflict of gazes between the one who loves and the one who is loved. Are we also obsessed by this character who’s raised by affection to the status of entity?

title: Maria
overview: When his wife dies during child-birth, Arsénio turns to a foul ritual with hopes of having the daughter he never got to know.

original_title: Uma Paciência Selvagem Me Trouxe Até Aqui
title: A Wild Patience Has Taken Me Here
overview: Vange, a lonely biker, is enchanted by the relationship and freedom of four girls, with whom she spends a weekend where exchanges about lesbian experiences and culture are present, accompanied by a mutual affection that gradually establishes itself.

title: Holy Family
overview: A dark comedy about a family of five brothers, a single and unemployed mother, and a grandmother. They live tight in a small apartment in Benfica. Everything gets complicated on the day when the emblematic Sardoal FC mascot escapes and the club is at risk of losing the championship..

title: Bad Honey
overview: At the beginning of the 20th century, a German household attempts to stay isolated from their new surroundings, in the south of Brazil. Their fear, however, sets the way for conflict.

title: Os Sonâmbulos
overview: In an automated world, an old factory feeds on its own work force.

title: The Last Nazi Hunter 2
overview: After a hard life of chasing nazis, Jacob Cohn is on his death bed. Recently, he found that one of the most bloodiest nazis, who almost killed him in a concentration camp, is hiding in Portugal. Friederich Haas was known also as the Dachau Dentist for pulling the teeth of the prisoners mouth, one by one, just for fun. Without alternatives, being to weak to go after him, Jacob sends his pacifist and shy grandson, Jean Luc to finish his last mission. Jean Luc has to go to Portugal and bring Friederich Haas' teeth to his grandfather.

title: The House
overview: Built in the New State to control the overseas students, the House of the Students of the Empire, situated in Lisbon with delegations in Coimbra and Porto, was fundamental in the fight for independence of the Portuguese colonies. Future leaders of the Liberation Movement, like Agostinho Neto and Amílcar Cabral, passed through this meeting point. The documentary The House restores the memories of the testimonies of the survivors of the House, fictionalizing in parallel excerpts of Pepetela´s “The Generations of Utopia”.

original_title: Porque é Este o Meu Ofício
title: Because This Is My Craft
overview: A film about the vortex of time. It’s also about childhood and how it marks us for life. It’s a film that speaks of the relationship a son has with his father. And of the many words never spoken because they’re written in one’s heart.

title: The Girl from Berlin
overview: A young woman returns to Lisbon to meet her ex-boyfriend after a stay in Berlin. While trying to resettle the old relationship, she gradually realizes that the emotional and physical dependance is the only element that bonds them.

title: Behave, Kid
overview: In a rural town, the relationship between teacher and student goes beyond the classroom and transforms their lives.
tagline: A teacher, a student, passion and prejudice.

title: Casamento Blindado
overview: Antonio Carlos and Clarinha are a young and beautiful couple - but Antonio spends little time with Clarinha, while she is busy with the arrangements of her younger brother's marriage.

title: Eu Sinto Muito
overview: A filmmaker is producing a documentary on personality disorders. He follows three people with some crisis or emotional instability, whom all have difficulties on maintaining personal relationships.

title: Dom Fradique
overview: A path for tourists on their way to the Castle of São Jorge, the Pátio Dom Fradique was once a popular courtyard where around sixty families used to live.Today, ruins of their houses are the unique remains.There, the erased memories of the old city history and the frenzy of the new Lisbon give way to a contemporary urban tale.

title: Road of Nothing
overview: Life is as unchanging as ever in the village: the sun sets between memories. The arrival of a young outsider changes everything. The old are offered a new gift and they accept it. The dreams awaken an old song which pulses through the village. 'With Fate driving the cart of everything along the road of nothing.'

title: O Espelho Lento
overview: The story of Carla and Marta, the daughter who is seriously ill. In Barcelona, Carla discovers a special mirror, which is an open door to the past: it keeps the reflection for several years instead of returning it immediately.  Carla offers her daughter the mirror and it will change their lives forever.

title: Mais
overview: Somewhere in the city of Porto, two lower class kids fall in love and dream of a different life.

title: Look No Further
overview: Elsie wakes Löic from a hidden grave in the forest. He does not remember anything, just what they are: vampires. With his memory slowly returning, Elsie fears that the love she feels for Loïc may not be enough to keep him by her side.

title: The Last Romantics
overview: Two young men share different points of view of the same sexual encounter in a public space.

title: Familiar Environment
overview: There are many ways to overcome the losses and drop-outs of childhood. Three boys reinvent the concept of family to face the traumas of their lives.

title: Soil
overview: The mountain burns in the August heat. A firefighter falls, swallowed by the ground. The broken body survives as it can. Outside, the night descends.

title: Mãe
overview: Madalena is Sônia's mother, who is Julia's mother, who is Camila's mother. A family of women so different, yet trapped by events and tragedies so interconnected. Closely related, distant due to fatality. A story where reality invades fiction.

title: The Age of Anxiety
overview: Love, fear and anxiety. A couple spends their last night together, in Lisbon, before one of them leaves for another country. A romantic night gives way to unspoken tensions in their life's turbulent present and the world's uncertain future.

title: Son of Ox
overview: João is a lonely boy living in the outback. No friends, no mother, and no bond with his father, he finds a chance to overcome his fears and a possibility to fit in when a small circus arrives in town.

production_companies.name: Fundação Cultural do Estado da Bahia

title: Leap.
overview: After sinking, Carlos turns up at the coast along with his colleagues. In a struggle for life already lost, Carlos tries to seek salvation by accepting death leaving his family behind.

title: My Castle My Home
overview: Guilherme is a boy with 13 years old that plays tennis, he has to see and deal with his nightmares and his own fears.

title: Apathy
overview: Rafael is a 20 year old who lives in the past, remembering it through old recordings.

title: Bicycle
overview: A young poet suffering from a heartbreak, embarks alone on a journey in search of his happiness.

title: Dynamite Girl
overview: Thiago is in love with a girl who appears every night in his dreams. Obsessed with the desire to meet her, the boy can no longer sleep.

title: Medo de Sangue
overview: The sound of something falling, broken glass, car alarm triggered. She runs down the stairs of the building and faces the scene. With desperation, she moves away, leaving in the background the bloody body of a man fallen into a wrecked car. In a blood bank, she fearfully awaits for the time to donate. He appears in front of her. A ghost? A memory? The moment of the blood donation will reveal the pain and the challenges of the couple`s separation.

title: Dark
overview: An inactive swim coach follows an enigmatic blind man who will help her overcome a past that haunts her and prevents her from practicing her profession.

title: Duda
overview: It's summer and Duda wants to go to the beach.

title: Doce de Coco
overview: Diana's family produces coconut sweets. João gathers the coconut and Diana and Lucia make the sweets. Zacarias sells product in the city. One day, Diana goes to the river with her mother and her aunt Maria.

title: Edifício Paraíso
overview: Over the course of one night, the trivial squabbles of five couples from the same apartment building escalate into potentially relationship-ending rows.
tagline: Five couples, one building

title: Nove Águas
overview: Brazil, 1930. Marcos and his family (descendants of slaves) left the Jequitinhonha Valley for the Mucuri Valley. Fleeing from the drought, hunger and violence in the countryside, the "quilombolas" sought a new territory to build their community. Decades later, when everything seems to be in peace, a huge construction company wants to build a dam in Marques' territory.

title: Take Wing
overview: Ants fly in downtown Fortaleza on a dawn lost in time.

title: Marias da Sé
overview: A typical day in Porto's Cathedral, between tourists and the local community. A peculiar group of women grabs our attention...

title: Desta Água...
overview: We only understand some behaviour when we duplicate them involuntarily.

title: Entre Macacos e Anjos
overview: Max, controversial and cult filmmaker, go into crisis  after knowing the diagnosis about your photophobia,  that points to possible blindness.  Trans-  developed, undertakes a complete overhaul of  their artistic, philosophical and affective postures,  projecting them on the film he makes.

title: Pas de Quoi
overview: A ferryboat. A meeting between two souls. Hurdles and shadows keep being overcome until the end. Bodies always striving to breathe along the way.

title: AzulScuro
overview: After her sister's mysterious death, Sofia comes across new evidence that might enlighten the case, while a demonic entity lurks in the darkness.

title: Kicks
overview: Sandra is pregnant and wants a girl. Her husband Marcos wants a soccer player.

title: Beasts
overview: The story of Lucas, a 13 year-old kid who swears vengeance to the man that abuses his mother in exchange for a miserable life.

title: Two
overview: Bernardo and Luix seek an affective approach during the period of social detachment. In the midst of chaos, they try to discover other ways of loving.

title: Attire
overview: After going through a hiring process for a company based on São Paulo, Daniel, that came from another city, now needs to deliver them some important documents. However, he is blocked from the entrance because he is wearing shorts.

title: Nico
overview: Isolated in an old and gloomy house, Tomaz and Martin spend their days in a tedious routine. One morning, Martin finds a young girl dead in the bathroom.

title: 25 Anos Sem Asfalto
overview: Rose is committed to ensure Pedro a better future than a life confined between the dirty streets of the neighborhood and the asphalt of the city, when an unexpected event will make her connect with her son's daily adventures.

title: Kombi
overview: Joana receives her grandfather’s ashes. At home, she finds his voyage diary that belonged to her grandfather and decides to recreate that journey. On the road, she meets Rui, who helps to find the truth about her past.
tagline: An adventure. Opportunities come when you least expect them. Joana will grab them, overcoming all the obstacles that life's journey imposes on her.

title: A Abóbada
overview: An adaptation of the story with the same name by Portuguese writer Alexandre Herculano.

original_title: Ninguém Sai de Casa à Toa
title: Ninguém Sai de Casa à Toa
Feeling Blue
overview: 'Feeling Blue' is a visual representation of a morning soaked by depression. It is also the struggle and the poetic beauty of life shown through a dark point of view.

title: A Present Light
overview: On a rainy night, a sad man leaves his home to deliver a letter to someone who recently left him. At a corner, he meets a woman who warns him about the slippery road. This is how I met Diana. Suffering from a heartbreak, Gonçalo falls from his motorbike.

title: Before Summer Ends
overview: Small great events of a family summer in the countryside.

title: Windmill Road
overview: António (21) lives in a small town and one day goes to Lisbon for an audition at the Conservatório Nacional de Dança. On the way, he meets Sebastião (25), a musician who goes in search of a life without limitations.

title: Tuesday Overnight
overview: At dawn, a boy, a city and unexpected encounters.

original_title: Meu diário no fim do mundo: Edição futebol
title: Meu diário no fim do mundo: Edição futebol
Uma Vida Toda Empatada
overview: An adaptation of the short story with the same name by Portuguese writer Mário de Carvalho.

title: Buried In The Backyard
overview: When younger, Isabela buried a revolver in the backyard, with a promise to take revenge on her stepfather, who assaulted her mother.  Years later she digs up the gun and goes in search of revenge.

title: White Mangrove
overview: An immersive look at the life of Maíra, a woman who lives in a small seaside town where she works as a masseuse in a resort. She pends her days in a routine without great enthusiasm and prospects, dividing herself between a bland job, a distant husband and long walks around the neighborhood. One afternoon, she is faced with an event that reverberates inside Maíra as an impulse to review her life as a whole.

title: Novo Mundo
overview: A paradise for the eyes, the phrase defines the character's destination place, A Terra Sem Males.  After walking through forests and ruins, she realizes that that territory was built on the blood of many peoples.  This knowledge could paralyze her, create fear, but they inspire acts of courage.

original_title: Um cavalo olhou pro céu com esperanças de fuga
title: A horse looked at the sky with hope of escape
overview: For 19 minutes, as we watch a horse reflecting on fatherhood, space rockets, time and interpersonal relationships, his trail of thoughts hovers in the air in the form of ghostly colors.
tagline: THERE IS NO ESCAPE, OR PERMANENCE.

original_title: Preces Precipitadas de um Lugar Sagrado Que Não Existe Mais
title: Preces Precipitadas de um Lugar Sagrado Que Não Existe Mais
overview: Dawn, returning home after a reggae party, Breno ends up in a place between the present, the past and the future

title: De Costas Pro Rio
overview: After the contact of a spirit from the forest, Pietro returns to Manaus to save her.  He must prevent the city from being destroyed by a Big Snake that sleeps in the region's underground.

title: August Sky
overview: In a world on fire, a seven-month-old pregnant nurse deals with growing anxiety while gradually finding herself attracted to a member of the Pentecostal church and her community.

title: The Siege
overview: Ana is surrounded.  In the apartment below, the ghosts of the past and on the terrace, the ghosts of the future.

title: Eu. Empresa
overview: A self-employed worker faces financial and emotional problems. Without any decent opportunities, he creates a channel on YouTube as an attempt to monetize on his own failures while takes precarious jobs in huge corporations.

title: Voltei!
overview: Brazil, 2030. The sisters Alayr and Sabrina are hearing on the cell radio the judgment that could change the course of a country "without energy". They are surprised by Fátima, the sister who returns from the dead to fraternize on this historic night.

title: A Morte do Super-Homem
overview: Luís Carlos is back from a six-week trip to Boston, where he was doing research on Superman for his master’s thesis. He considers Superman to be one of the best heroes of all time – if not the best. When he arrives in Lisbon and discovers that Superman has died, despair takes over his life.

title: Stanley
overview: Two boys, one girl, one night in the Northeast of Brazil. A morning of passion and secrets revealed.

title: As Cinzas da Mãe
overview: Since childhood, Isabel remembers her mother's recurring request: to be cremated. And now that the day has come, with her husband Daniel at her side, it is the mother's voice that she hears, which surprises her because the mother is there, in the urn, about to be cremated, as she always wanted. And since then, she has been making herself heard, accompanied by a letter left in her will, with precise instructions, which, being drastic, may end Isabel's marriage.

title: O Rapaz do Tambor
overview: Jaime, an introverted young man, suffers from the humiliations his schoolmates inflict on him. The father, director of the school, distant and of absolute power, treats him with indifference. With the support of his mother, Jaime finds in a painting, a boy with a drum in front of the troops in battle, the inspiration and the example of courage that will transform him into an unlikely hero in the fight against oppression.

title: Mutter
overview: The short film began from an adaptation of the comic book "The Last Man" from the collection Y. It takes place in a near future, in the world where human clones and human fight for power domination. Dr. Teresa is about to give birth a child. She is accompanied by her assistant. Both look for Dr. Pedro for assistance. He refuses at first.

title: The Act
overview: With the world in suspension Dante meets Ava, a woman who offers him her affection to facilitate his crossing over to the other side.

title: Fronteira
overview: 1970. To Fronteira's village arrives a new chief to the Fiscal Guard. With unshakable convictions about the application of the Law, he quickly comes into confrontation with the population, which survives with the practice of smuggling. But a passionate conflict calls into question all your values and your sense of duty, forcing him to make an unexpected and irreversible decision.

title: From Another Seasons
overview: After a terrible loss, Nívea embarks on a trip to the south of Minas with her friends: Serena and Iara. Together they reflect on everything that makes them who they are.

title: Aliena
overview: Porto Alegre, 2041. The negligence of the mining company Flora Rica results in the imminent breaking of their dam and puts people in danger. Amidst this announced catastrophe, six youngsters get together for a last moment of celebration.

title: New World
overview: Conceição and Presto, an interracial couple, ask Presto's brother for his signature as a guarantor of the financial request supposed to assure them an apartment in Leblon, the whitest neighborhood in Rio de Janeiro. The process proves to be much harder than they had imagined.

title: Despedida
overview: When 11-year-old Ana travels to her grandmother’s funeral in a town in the state of Rio Grande do Sul, strange things begin to happen. Next to her family’s house lies a forest, and within it a magical world inhabited by ghosts, wolves, and all sorts of fantastic beings. In the course of a carnival holiday, a family mystery linking her grandmother and her mother must be unraveled through intuition and courage. Only then will the wounds of the past be healed to re-enchant the present.

title: Short Journeys into the Night
overview: Six musicians from São Paulo, Brazil, dream of being discovered at night, alternating days in precarious services and early mornings, seeking a path in the world of music

title: A Lei
overview: Soldiers from the Military Police stand at the counter of a decadent diner, where they can eat greasy food without paying the bill. When they discuss their violent job in one of the biggest cities in the world, they make it clear who, in the name of the law, is allowed to commit the most hideous crimes.

title: The lighthouse island
overview: "The lighthouse island" recounts the story and legends of a mysterious and inhospitable island, also known as Rasa Island, not far from the city of Rio de Janeiro. Somewhere between historical rescue and invention, a silent family ventures across the sea in a small boat towards the island.
tagline: Fiction

title: Mister Powerful
overview: A shy cosplayer invents a superhero persona for himself based on the heroes from old Japanese tokusatsu television shows, but his confidence is threatened by the everyday villains of his life.

title: Novembro
overview: Julio lives depressed until an unexpected encounter forces him to choose between drowning in past trauma or opening up to a new love.

title: Amores Artificiais
overview: The Knights of Good must face their most difficult enemy... Zaboo's mother.

title: Sweet River
overview: Under pressure from a back pain and being constantly short of money, Tiago (played by Okado do Canal) experiences an encounter that will reshape everything he knew about his own father, instilling an imminent crisis in his way of being. Set amid the outskirts of Olinda and the Recife middle class, the film contrasts both worlds without ignoring or overlooking the complexity of human relationships. In this universe where rap beats and community life thrive, we glimpse through the cracks of a disintegrating family model the construction of another masculinity.

title: Lunch Break
overview: 1979. Four female workers have lunch break inside the ladies' room, at a metallurgical factory. Between laughs and scuffles, each one has a secret of their own.

title: 2020: An Odyssey on the 3rd Left
overview: During a perilous maneuver, Socks has his spacecraft damaged. To repair it, he embarks on an unprecedented journey through the vastness of outer space, where a much greater threat dwells: the Astro-Zombies.

title: The Night's Substance
overview: Jaiane now lives in Brazil, while Aissa, a Mozambican sailor who has just arrived in the city, tries to have a real experience on dry land. A story of unconventional passion follows.

title: Blindman's Buff
overview: Gabi believes in her ability to act in times of injustice, relying on her physical abilities. One day, Gabi finds out that her brother, Daniel, is a victim of bullying in their neighbourhood. Suffering from unexpected outbreaks of sleepwalking, he disappears from home during the night. While trying to avenge him, Gabi realizes that perhaps all the coinciding events related to her brother are a test made by ghosts of the past.

title: Bittersweet Power
overview: In one night, Lucas, Luiza and Bia remember the pains and delights of being who they are.

title: Desvirtude
overview: Kenia, a black journalism student, is attacked during an activity at the university, and has to deal with repercussions and retaliations in her case.

title: Deluge
overview: A family struggles to survive isolated from civilization, with the exception of a neighbor who lives nearby. A storm that has haunted them for the past four years, tests the family’s faith while they face their crop’s decay and other peculiar events.

title: Five Minutes a Day
overview: Working in a small security kiosk, two men take advantage of the shift change to get to know each other and forge a touching bond.

title: Summerboy
overview: The story takes place in the summer of the 90s, in a small town in the state of São Paulo, and has 3 main characters, such as Lucas, Sister Lucélia and Augusto. Lucas is a 20-year-old religious boy and part of a youth group at the church, he is also Sister Lucélia's right-hand man, who is the same age and recently became a nun. Lucélia is worried about the actions of her brother, Augusto, and asks him to return to the small town and to participate in the youth group with the intention of returning him to the ways of God. So, she tasks Lucas with helping him on this journey. However, Guto's arrival puts Lucas' life upside down, as he teaches his sister's darling a new meaning of love. This process is both liberating and confusing for Lucas, who now, for more than 20 years, has had to come clean about everything that happened that summer. Embark on this story full of turning points and remember, each character hides a secret.

title: Nha Sunhu
overview: Issa, a footballer from Guinea-Bissau who plays in Portugal, is contacted by two filmmakers who want to know more about his life and make a documentary. Exposing the voices behind the camera, Nha Sunhu is a reflection on the gaze, bias, and representation of the other.

original_title: 1964: O Brasil Entre Armas e Livros
title: 1964: Brazil between weapons and books
overview: We question the most unquestionable period in our history. The result was an international investigation with part of secret attempts, discovery of Soviet documents and a lot of investigation by the Brazilian media. It was all under our eyes.

title: Hotel Royal
overview: 'In the course of my cleaning duties, I examined the belongings of each guest of the hotel and observed through the details, lives that will remain unknown', says the temporary Chambermaid in a large seaside hotel, which, unable to communicate, lives through a rigid methodology of analysis of the exterior and a ritualised quotidian. Until the uncontrollable comes to disrupts this dynamic.  Hotel Royal is fragmented and incomplete mosaic of contemporary societies. It could be dubbed a film about the horrors of the soul, about voyeurs or simply about misfits.

original_title: Todas as Rotas Noturnas Conduzem ao Alvorecer
title: Morning Has Broken
overview: Alexander just got out of prison. Lonely and silent, he finds some comfort in his friendship with Robson, his co-worker.

title: 2071 - Horoscopes and Psychotropics
overview: It is a feature film in development and research. It tells the story of a pharmacopornographic treatment imposed on a woman after an attempted suicide. But it is the year 2071 that an alternative comes to her.

title: Tempest
overview: In spite of bad omen about the upcoming storm, the fisherman sets out to the sea and doesn’t return. The wife of the fisherman embarks on a journey to find the storm whisperer who could calm down the sea and return the fisherman home.
tagline: Woman deceives her perception to deal with the loss of her love.

title: Água Fria
overview: Disillusionment helps the feet enter the cold water. It is like a whisper indifferent to the distorted music that echoes round the beach.

title: The Waves
overview: The connection between the Portuguese coast line and the memories of someone's past.

title: Céu Na Terra
overview: In the middle of the Rio Carnival, Patrícia and Paula live their encounters and disagreements.

title: Naticorda
overview: Sounds, nature and strings.

title: Almost Free
overview: "It's tomorrow, Chico. Can you believe it? ", says Romano to his cellmate. After so many years together, confined to that precarious iron box, the wait will finally come to an end. A few hours separates them from freedom. One will be released; the other, executed. Anyway, at sunrise, they won't be there anymore. It's their last moments, after all, it's almost morning.

title: The Well
overview: Someone goes through the darkness, finds you and gives you a name: Bo. He drags you to a group that, together, celebrates your arrival. Everyone there was waiting for you. "To the light. Bo has come to save us all!" They repeat, euphoric. You are Bo. That is all you know. A name and a sentence: find a way out or join the dust.

title: How to Breathe Out of Water
overview: On the way back from the swimming practice, Janaina is violently approached by the police. Safe back home, she differently faces her relationship with her father Julio, who’s a policeman.

production_companies.name: Escola de Comunicações e Artes, Universidade de São Paulo

original_title: Às vezes sou pessoa, às vezes sou dinossauro
title: Às vezes sou pessoa, às vezes sou dinossauro
Cacicus
overview: The exchange of messages in notes left in the clothes with Camila, a frequent client, brings the possibility of escaping from the noisy world of washing machines operating 24 hours a day for a moment of peace and silence.
tagline: Laura lives and works with her father in a laundry on the verge of bankruptcy.

original_title: Um Quadro do Pollock com Sangue
title: Um Quadro do Pollock com Sangue
Quando Pudermos
overview: David is a freelancer living with his girlfriend and their sick son. Problems arise when they don’t have money for his medication.

title: O Fim da Imagem
overview: The existential crisis of the image haunting humanity.

title: Beyond Tragedies
overview: Recalling his childhood and relationship with his mother, a film student tries to understand the origin of his love for cinema and tragedies.
tagline: to Suka.

original_title: O Evangelho Segundo o Fascismo - A Ofensa Final
title: The Gospel According to Fascism - The Final Offense
overview: If Jesus came to Earth today, would his teachings and philosophy be in line with the agitated moods we live in today?  Batata Filmes presents a new collage project, mixing the playful Jesus of cinema with statements made by many of his followers, in an uncomfortable and provocative experience. Contains high offensive potential for small minds.

production_companies.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema

title: Moth Night
overview: Lira is an actress in the face of a world that is coming to an end. While artists are consumed, the moth flies through the night.

title: Ruídos de passos
tagline: Based on the short story by Clarice Lispector

title: Filhas da Pátria
overview: During the student crisis of 1968, Ines, an 18-year-old homosexual, is prevented from attending law school by her family, who believe that this is not the right course for a woman. This awakens in Inês a feeling of injustice, which leads her to accept Julio's invitation to join the high school students' association. The next day, we find out that the student association has been closed since they found a copy of the clandestine newspaper "Avante!" on the premises.  The rectory then decides to expel suspicious students, starting a revolt in the high school and an ideological confrontation between the couple of Inês and Adelaide.

title: Infantry
overview: In a conservative and swampy Brazil, a birthday party is held at a fatherless home. Joana, the birthday girl, wants to get her period soon. Her brother, Dudu, wants his father home. When teenager Verbena arrives unannounced, all the wishes can come true. But not without some pain.

title: I Am Her Daughter
overview: Amidst the covid-19 quarantine, a young woman makes video calls with 3 different woman under suspicious pretexts - but something bigger connects them.
tagline: a young woman in search for her origins

title: Diaries II: Tamara
overview: Stuck in an abusive relationship, Tamara doesn't see her tragic situation. On a special night, an accident might change it all. This is the second part of a short-film trilogy called Diaries where soulful transformations take place in one night of each character’s lives. It’s embuied with mystery and filled with fantasy, blurring the line of reality and imagination.
tagline: A woman faces herself and her toxic relationship

title: Diaries I: Eve
overview: Eve is a single soon-to-be mother and is tired of her own loneliness, doubting her decision to be a mother. On this night, Eve wakes up to face her doubts and on the brink of her crisis, an unexpected answer appears.
tagline: short-film about a pregnant woman facing her fears.

title: God
overview: Gustavo is a young adult attending law school. He is outgoing and polite, much of his upbringing comes from his Catholic upbringing. Very religious, Gustavo has dual feelings about his sexuality.

title: Taste of Hope
overview: From a peculiar narrative, “Esperanza” builds a subtle and simple allegory about the phenomenon of immigration of people from other South American countries to Brazil, in a relationship that reveals places of approximation, but also historical and dramaturgical spaces that point to the effects of a certain imperialism that surrounds such processes. All this concentrated in the suffocated atmosphere of the protagonist.

title: Onliest
overview: In a reality where the common goal is to find one’s freedom, lives a peculiar man who hasn’t yet fulfilled that wish. He feels trapped despite having flight as his biggest ambition.
tagline: We have always heard that you need a pair of wings to fly

original_title: Entre a Luz e o Nada
title: Between Light and Nowhere
overview: It’s summer and it feels like everything is melting. The body melts in sweat and the afternoon fades into endless nights. Weird dreams invade Shade’s sleep and unexplainable lights appear in the sky. Between work, home and friends, Shade seems to be floating. They are in suspension, in an intermediate state in which the reality of the world does not sustain itself.

title: A Boy named Jaime
overview: A short movie written and directed by André Marques.
tagline: A young boy lives in the illusion that the brutal behavior of his father is usual in our society, until the moment when he realizes that behavior will not end soon. To leave this the boy ends doing the unthinkable.

title: Promise of a Wild Love
overview: After crashing into a party, a young man discovers that this will be his last night.

original_title: Todos Os Prêmios Que Eu Nunca Te Dei
title: All the Awards I Never Gave You
overview: An unexpected encounter between two young actors on the rise, in the bathroom of an award venue, brings up unresolved feelings and a love story that has possibly not come to an end yet.

title: Mistida
overview: An immigrant mother, hurting from a backache, calls for her son to help carry her groceries home. Along their way, they talk about the future through the past, returning to all of their disagreements, disillusionments, rancor and resentments.

production_companies.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema

title: The Daughters of Fire
overview: The story of three young cape-verdean sisters upon their arrival at a foreign European port, in an attempt to escape another devastating eruption of the volcano Fogo. In this unknown country, they roam, hand in hand, evoking their secret fears through music and singing.

title: Alambamento
overview: When Matias goes to deliver his dowry to his fiance's father, an unexpected accident makes him realize how much he is willing to fight for her love.

title: Terra Queimada
overview: In 1810, Joaquim, Ana and their two kids are separated by the imminent Buçaco battle, while Lord Wellington and Commander Masséna prepare their armies.

title: Amores (a)Típicos
overview: Whether for neurotypical or autistic people, love doesn't have a unique way of expressing itself. There is no typical love. Relationships and romantic love are challenging for everyone. For autistics, then, the matter can gain other layers of complexity. Or is it not? Marcos Maia and Sophia Mendonça mediate this dialogue, with great guests.

title: Floating House
overview: It tells the story of Araci, a woman who saw her daughter murdered by ranchers. She emigrates to Mértola with her husband and their granddaughter, who will grow up without forgetting the indigenous rituals and teachings of Brazil.

original_title: As Mil Palavras de Giacomo Geremia
title: As Mil Palavras de Giacomo Geremia
overview: The story of photographer Giacomo Geremia.

title: SP Zero 15
overview: 15 directors telling 15 tales about São Paulo.

title: Vermelho Monet
overview: Follows the story of Johannes Van Almeida, a painter who was just released from prison and wants to start his life anew, but everything changes when art dealer Antoinette, and international actress in crisis Florence Lizz, get in his way.

title: Xavier and Miguel
overview: Xavier decides to shoot with his cell phone his weekend with his best friend Miguel to tell the world and his father, Nicolas, that he might be in love with him. Xavier and Miguel is the sequel of the short film Xavier (2015).

title: PAJUBÁ - Vivendo a Interseccionalidade
overview: "Pajubá" is a language created by black LGBTs as a mode of resistance. Given this, the present short film seeks to rescue the reality of people who experience in their own skin the strength of intersectionality between race, gender and sexuality in the São Francisco Valley region.

title: Rastro
overview: A football player and part-time fisherman starts to clean the beach he lives next to.

title: Love
overview: After being diagnosed with Alzheimer's, Lino Santos Gomes, the grandfather of director Barbara Marques, will move in with his family. Videos were made with cell phone lenses. From chaos to love, a grandpa’s day.
tagline: From chaos to love: a day by day of a grandpa.

title: The Boat and the River
overview: Vera is a religious woman who takes care of a vessel in the port of Manaus. She needs to deal with Sister Josi with whom she disagrees about how to handle the boat and how to live life.

title: King Kong en Asunción
overview: An old hired killer is hiding in the interior of Bolivia, in the desert region of the Salar de Uyuni. You just committed your last murder. After months in isolation, he travels to the interior of Paraguay where he receives a good reward and heads to Asunción with the aim of meeting his daughter.

title: Moço
overview: Confronted with his mother's infidelity and his father's emotional absence, João arrives at a sunset where he refuses to return home.

title: Before the Mountains
overview: A theft of water, a homicide, a question of honour, a tragedy in the village of Gralhas, Montalegre.

title: Redemption
overview: A young woman travels to solve a matter of life or death. As she seeks to do what she needs, the city exposes itself with its curious characters.

title: Receita de Caranguejo
overview: After her father's death, Lari and her mother go for a trip to the family beach house. They decide to cook some crabs. And the animals, gradually, become luminous beings.

title: Chlorine
overview: Two different moments in his life. The first love and the real love. Traumas from the past stick like chlorine in water.

title: Manaus Hot City
overview: Two friends meet to eat a bodó fish. The talk between them goes through the colors and smells of the houses in the heat of the city. Someone stays and someone leave.
tagline: Manaus Hot City

title: No Place
overview: When Nego discovers that a cocoa farm where he lives and works will be sold, he needs to face not only the loss of his home and his job, but also the daily contact he has with the land he loves so much.

title: 4 Billions Infinites
overview: Brazil. 2020. A family lives with the energy of the house cut off. While the mother works, her children stay at home talking about having hope.

original_title: O que acontece quando nada acontece
title: What happens when nothing happens
overview: During a long period of isolation, two friends face the challenge of getting away from some important people, until an important message comes through a letter that was lost.

title: Offline
overview: After a presidential decree that shuts off the Internet connection nationwide, two neighbours who have never met before but have an online relationship decide to leave the big city and try out a living in the real world.

title: Gaze Club
overview: Please do not enter with clothes on.

title: Nha Mila
overview: After fourteen years away from her homeland, Salomé is forced to return to Cape Verde to see her dying brother. During her stopover at Lisbon airport, Águeda, a cleaning lady, recognizes Salomé as "Mila", her childhood friend. Águeda invites Salomé to leave the airport and spend the stopover at her home, with the women of her family. The neighborhood transports her on a spiritual journey, whose destination reveals a painful bond with her homeland.

title: A Portrait of Butterflies
overview: Alexandra and Miguel meet regularly and passionately at her home. He has already started to create some expectations for the future. She is still trying to understand where that is going to take her. This gap between them leads them to confrontation in a way that will mark them for life

title: Alano
overview: Desires and frustrations emerge from the encounter of two characters, Miguel (a filmmaker) and Alano (a rent boy), where Alano’s pursuit of pleasure contrasts with Miguel’s quest for company.

title: Prisma
overview: A meeting between two friends and an unknown attraction. The borderline between the real and the imagined, the inside and outside, friendship and love, one body and another. Prism is the story of a connection between surfaces that being in touch wakes the shattered power of feelings.

title: Bibliografia
overview: In the summer of 1969, four friends built a raft to travel down two Portuguese rivers from the center of the country to Lisbon. Forty years later, the son of one of these men reported this event in a book of poems, as a metaphor of the Portuguese travel literature of the 16Th and 17Th centuries. After, it occurred to him to turn the poems into a real event, to invite some friends to reenact the raft journey and exhibit texts from those peregrinations. His brother went along to film the floating recital.

title: Vista para dias nublados
overview: Manuela and Bento are a couple of retired artists that spend most of their days observing Lúcia, their window neighbor. Until one day, Lúcia stops opening the balcony of her apartment and Manuela finds herself trying to find new meaning for what she sees.

title: Ave Rara
overview: They all say that you killed an Angel. Who says that ? They. It’s not an Angel. It isn’t ? No. It’s a rare bird, just like you and me.

title: Rádio Capital Alvorada
overview: For decades, Brasilia was the stage of an iconic radio station. On its last day on the air, the few but captive listeners did not know that it was the end.

title: Unliveable
overview: Just before the pandemic, the world experiences a phenomenon never seen before. Marilene looks for her daughter Roberta, a trans woman who went missing. While running out of time, she discovers a hope for the future.

title: Há Sempre um Amanhã
overview: Paulo Lima is an engineer responsible for a multinational factory. Due to the recession, the factory receives a visit from the factory's owner's daughter, Luísa, who is sent to increase the factory's profit. Some cuts are due to make.

title: Julieta de Bicicleta
overview: Julieta rides her son's bicycle into the night. Her trip is interrupted by an attempted robbery, but she gets some help from a friend of her son.

title: Corte
overview: At the core of a royal court unbalanced by the long absence of its King, where women seem to have disappeared along with reason, the Crown Prince is murdered. Wrapped in the plot of the promoters of a decaying libertine spirit, the heir’s brothers, a pair of twins united by the music they play together and their Valet, witness a hunt for the prepetator launched by the palace doctor's deduction. In the background of all the chatter rises the individual desire of the twins for the dynasty.

production_companies.name: Escola Superior de Teatro e Cinema

title: Subcutaneous
overview: The skin is not the limit.

title: A Pedra
overview: A young girl, traveling in the south of Angola, meets a retired doctor who deals with the memories of war and its perpetual waste. An adaptation of the short tale "The Dragonfly", by Ondjaki.

original_title: Nada de Bom Acontece Depois dos 30
title: Nothing Good Comes After Your 30's
overview: In a world where people don't age, the government finds itself facing a population crisis.  It is then created a government program to control overpopulation.  The program involves the killing of people who turn 30.  However, a man questions himself about this political doctrine during his last birthday.

title: Segredos
overview: Helena is doctor in a big hospital. One night she hears a love song through her window and starts living for that song that she hears everynight.

title: Confined
